üè∑Ô∏è"A flavor enhancer that will make your aromas very sweet!"  - [Link: Jammy/Candy Wizard](https://flavourart.com/en/store/flavors/wizard-and-flash/jammy-candy-wizard-en/)

Usage: Diluted at 0.5%

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

2019 | Testing: SFT - 0.75%  |  Jammy/Candy  Wizard 0.75+ Bano (FA) 3%

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | asMODus C4 RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton

\_ \_ \_ \_ \_

1 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Tester Bottle

\- Aroma: Aroma Intensity ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è

\- Description: Sweet Fruity Aroma

\- Knuckle: Sweet, Fruity. Citrus, Kiwi like with Berry

​

‚ñ∫Vape: Solo Tester - 0.75%

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Sweet, Juicy and Tart flavor. Mixture of a Malic Acid like tartness and flavor with Fruit. Fruit Tartness and Flavor like Passionfruit. Light & Thin Body with a Watery & Mouth Puckering Mouth Feel

​

üîπ Vape: Jammy/Candy Wizard 0.75% + Banana (Bano) FA 3%

\- Knuckle: Sweet Citrusy Banana

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Natural. Semi-Sweet & Tart. Citrusy, Semi-Ripe Banana Flavor with undertones of a ‚ÄúSweeter‚Äù Flavor. Moderately Light Body with a Smooth but Watery Mouth Feel.

\_ \_ \_ \_ \_\_ \_ \_ \_ \_

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: N/A

\- No Identifiable ‚ÄúJammy‚Äù texture or quality

\- Identifiable Sweet Tart Candy-Like Taste and qualities on Banana Mixture

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

2 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Tester Bottle

\- Aroma: Aroma Intensity ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è

\- Description: Unchanged

\- Knuckle: Sweet /Citrus Lighter ‚Äì More of a Lighter Berry flavor

​

‚ñ∫Vape: Solo Tester - 0.75%

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è ‚Üì

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Noticeable Changes | Overall Significantly Softer & Less Citrusy. A gentle and Mellow mixture of an Unripe Strawberry/Passionfruit - like Flavor. Medium Bodied with a Lightly Sticky Marshmallow Fluff-like Mouth Feel.

​

üîπ Vape: Jammy/Candy Wizard 0.75% + Banana (Bano) FA 3%

\- Knuckle: Sweet and Tart, Gooey\* Banana

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Noticeable and Significant Changes ‚úÖ | Natural Semi-Ripe\* Banana Flavor with a gentle Citrus undertone. Medium Bodied with a Moderately Full, Sticky Fluff\* Coated Mouthfeel.

\_ \_ \_ \_ \_\_ \_ \_ \_ \_

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: No Noticeable Off Notes

\- Banana + J/CWizard = Not typical Fake Artificial ‚ÄúCandied‚Äù flavor or texture like Banana Candy Flavors. Adds Sweetness + increases Body + Texture = Lightly Sticky, Fluffy, and Denser

\- Similar to "Jam It" (VTA) without the heavy/noticeable Passionfruit-like flavor | J/CWizard = Fuller Body, Mouthfeel and "Denser"

‚ñ∫Mixing % Estimate\*

Usage: 0.15% min ‚Ä¢ 0.5% med ‚Ä¢ 1% max

reviewsJson.title: Jammy/Candy Wizard
